name: Forest Camping Tent 4-Person
description: Spacious 4-person tent with waterproof coating and easy setup — ideal for woodland camping trips.

name: Compact 2-Person Backpacking Tent
description: Lightweight 2-person tent for trekking and spontaneous adventures. Quick to pitch and tear down.

name: 65L Hiking Backpack - TrailMaster
description: Durable 65 L backpack with multiple compartments and rain cover — perfect for long hikes and camping trips.

name: Compact 25L Daypack
description: Lightweight 25 L daypack for short hikes or city/nature trips. Minimalist and ergonomic design.

name: Down Sleeping Bag -10°C
description: Premium down-filled sleeping bag rated for -10°C. Lightweight and compressible — great for backpacking.

name: Synthetic Sleeping Bag 0°C
description: Synthetic insulated sleeping bag rated for 0°C. Easy to clean and ideal for mild-weather camping.

name: LED Camping Lantern - 1000 Lm
description: Bright LED lantern with 360° illumination and long battery life for campsite use.

name: Solar Powered Folding Lantern
description: Foldable solar lantern — perfect for hiking, night walks, or sustainable camping trips.

name: Portable Camp Stove Deluxe
description: Compact and efficient camp stove with dual burners. Perfect for cooking meals outdoors.

name: Trekking Poles Set
description: Adjustable aluminum trekking poles with comfortable grips and shock absorption.

name: Insulated Water Bottle 32oz
description: Vacuum-insulated stainless steel bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Camping Hammock Double
description: Lightweight portable hammock for two. Sets up in seconds and packs down small.

name: Folding Camp Chair
description: Comfortable folding chair with cup holder and storage pocket. Lightweight and portable.

name: Multi-Tool Camping Kit
description: Essential 15-in-1 multi-tool with knife, pliers, screwdrivers, and more.

name: First Aid Kit Complete
description: Comprehensive 200-piece first aid kit for outdoor adventures and emergencies.

name: Waterproof Dry Bag 20L
description: Keep your gear dry with this durable waterproof dry bag. Perfect for kayaking and rafting.
